verses.name: 3 John 1:1
verses.text: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.

verses.name: 3 John 1:2
verses.text: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.

verses.name: 3 John 1:3
verses.text: For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.

verses.name: 3 John 1:4
verses.text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.

verses.name: 3 John 1:5
verses.text: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;
